remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別 (Class) 會實作 和 。This class implements and . 這個類別的執行個體 (Instance) 是從 方法和 方法傳回的。Instances of this class are returned from the method and from the method. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，這由產生[Entity Data Model 精靈](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5). 下列範例會從 方法傳回 。The following example returns an from the method. 然後，它會取得列舉值並且逐一查看查詢結果。Then it gets an enumerator and iterates through the query results. 最後，它會釋放列舉值和 物件。At the end, it releases the enumerator and the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉包含查詢結果的 。Closes the , which contains the results of the query. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會從 方法傳回 。The example returns an from the method. 然後，它會取得列舉值並且逐一查看查詢結果。Then it gets an enumerator and iterates through the query results. 最後，它會釋放列舉值和 物件。At the end, it releases the enumerator and the object. summary.span: 傳回逐一查看查詢結果的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the query results.

returns.span: 逐一查看查詢結果的列舉值。

span.span: An enumerator that iterates through the query results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不再需要此列舉值時，就會加以處置 (Dispose)。The enumerator must be disposed when no longer needed. 使用`foreach`陳述式 (`For Each` Visual Basic 中) 可確保完成反覆項目產生的結果時，正確處置列舉值。Using the `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic) ensures that the enumerator is correctly disposed when iteration over the results is complete. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會從 方法傳回 。The example returns an from the method. 然後，它會取得列舉值並且逐一查看查詢結果。Then it gets an enumerator and iterates through the query results. 最後，它會釋放列舉值和 物件。At the end, it releases the enumerator and the object.
